# jumpcloud Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
terraform {
  required_providers {
    jumpcloud = {
      source = "techjavelin/jumpcloud"
    }
  }
}

provider "jumpcloud" {
  api_key = "API_KEY_GOES_HERE"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `api_key` (String, Sensitive) API Key Used to connect to the JumpCloud API
